name: favicon-generator
title: Favicon Generator
description: Generate favicons in multiple sizes (16x16, 32x32, 64x64) from an image
content:
Overview

This application generates favicons in multiple standard sizes from a single input image. Built using Pillow, it creates PNG files for each size and a multi-size ICO file.

Features

  • Generate favicons in 16x16, 32x32, and 64x64 sizes
  • High-quality LANCZOS resampling
  • Creates individual PNG files for each size
  • Generates a multi-size favicon.ico file
  • Supports transparency (RGBA)

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your source image (square images work best)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates:

  • favicon_16x16.png
  • favicon_32x32.png
  • favicon_64x64.png
  • favicon.ico (multi-size)

Use Cases

  • Creating website favicons
  • Generating app icons for web applications
  • Preparing icons for browser tabs
  • Creating bookmark icons
